short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improvised AWS Saml Login Page for multiple Accounts & Roles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin enhances the login experience for AWS accounts with SAML-based SSO setup and multiple AWS accounts and roles. With this plugin, you can easily filter out the AWS accounts by name or ID, making it much faster to find the right account and role to log in to.

Plugin Features -
- Improved UI/UX experience 
- Quickly filter out AWS accounts by name or ID using the Search
- Mark Accounts as Favourite to be shown on top
- Easily copy the Account ID
- Sign In button on the top of the screen, which allows you to easily sign in to the selected AWS account and role

DISCLAIMER: This extension is provided "as is" without any guarantees or warranty. The author shall not be held liable for any damages or losses arising from the use of this extension. Use at your own risk. The author reserves the right to modify or discontinue the extension at any time without prior notice. The author is not affiliated with AWS or endorsed by any third-party services or companies mentioned in the extension.
